mapper.update: update loyalty_card_th_allocation set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, open_member_id = #{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_realname = #{memberRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lot_no = #{lotNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_num = #{totalNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, used_num = #{usedNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allocate_time = #{allocateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, allocate_user = #{allocateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, member_id, open_member_id, member_realname, lot_no, type, total_num, used_num, allocate_time, allocate_user from loyalty_card_th_allocation where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
